Description: Round-topped limestone stela of User divided into three registers: 1 - Four rows of Hieroglyphic text. 2 - Scene of the deceased(dog at feet) seated before offerings and a male figure; columns of Hieroglyphic text flank scene. 3 - Three kneeling female figures sniffing lotus-flowers.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (pl.38)
